channel.title: Class Suggestion - The Smith/BlackForge
channel.description:
[quote] <big>[color=DodgerBlue]**The Smith**[/color]<big>
[color=DodgerBlue]Blue Dragon Offensive[/color]
**Iron Crate (Passive)** - Occupation and Redirection immune.
**Flame Smoke (Day)** - Make a player talk to themselves for 10 seconds. They wont notice. Cannot use during trials. 3 Use.
**Weapon Distract (Night)** - If your target do somethings that isnt investigate, you will occupy them. You will not know if you successfully occupy someone. Unlimited Use. You wont know it they are occupation immune.
**Iron Armor (Night)** - Give player death immune for the night. Regain an use if target didnt get attacked. 2 Use. Cannot target King. (Special announcement: *You have destroyed [color=DodgerBlue]Smith[/color] or [color=Violet]BlackForge[/color] **Iron Armor**.*)
Win condition: *You must defeat the [color=violet]Unseen[/color] or the [color=Crimson]Cult[/color] or any **Neutral** that stand in your ways.* [/quote]
[quote] <big>[Color=Violet]**BlackForge**[/color]<big>
[color=Violet]Unseen Offensive[/color]
**Enchanted Dagger (Passive)** - When you are alive, your [color=Violet]Assassin[/color] attack will be bypass death immune. This passive is lost when you succeed bypass someone immunity
**Iron Crate (Passive)** - Occupation and Redirection immune.
**Violet Smoke (Day)** - Make a player talk to themselves for 10 seconds. They wont notice. Cannot use during trials. 3 Use.
**Armor Distraction (Night)** - If your target do somethings that isnt investigate, you will occupy them. You will learn their class and make [color=Violet]Unseen[/color] NS to them if they used Investigate ability. Unlimited Use.
**Harden Armor (Night)** - Give wll member of [color=Violet]Unseen[/color] Death Immune tonight. Regain an use if no one was attacked. 2 Use. (This ability > MM Immune) (Special announcement: *You have destroyed [color=DodgerBlue]Smith[/color] or [color=Violet]BlackForge[/color] **Iron Armor**.*)
Win condition: *You must defeat the [color=DodgerBlue]Blue Dragon[/color] or any **Neutral** that dare to stand in your way.* [/quote]

item.title: Class Suggestion - The Smith/BlackForge
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
SweetyCake:

When you are alive, your Assassin attack will be unhealable. You keep this passive even if your class changed.

Enforce is a 2 time use night ability. Wall of fire is a 2 time use night ability.

In comparison, this ability despite having reduced effectiveness in killing power, makes the assassin (including yourself) into a reaper permanently.

That’s just busted. Given that Blackforge can do several other things per night, something has to be removed on it (maybe no keeping it when class changing)

item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
Ok, here’s my proposition for a day ability to replace flame smoke.

Don Armor (Day) - You will be night immune tonight. (Single Use)

or alternatively,

I have no idea what to name this (Day) - You will receive feedback for if your occupation was successful or not tonight. (Single Use)

Day abilities that are almost solely used to confirm people (noble twin) are inherently bad design as mechanical confirmation should be limited.
